column4: hey I got 2 simple and quick questions, First: how do I switch between kdm for gnome and vice versa? Second: HOw do I change KDE Look and feel without having to quit a gnome session? yeah I got KDE too
when I try to start KDM it says: KDM isn't your default Greeter
